platform_initiatives.title: Contacting, Made Easy
platform_initiatives.issue: Approaching leadership can be intimidating in formal contexts
resolutions: In-person presence at the CCSS lounge
Accessibility via direct email and Discord

platform_initiatives.title: Improved Event Awareness
platform_initiatives.issue: Current platforms (Instagram/Discord) may be missed by some students
resolutions: Shared Google Calendar for visual event tracking and reminders
Newsletter for condensed overview of upcoming events via email

platform_initiatives.title: Academic Support for Beginners
platform_initiatives.issue: Students with no prior coding experience may feel unprepared for classes or co-op
resolutions: Online course reviews to identify the best self-learning resources

platform_initiatives.title: Combating Isolation
platform_initiatives.issue: University can be an isolating experience, especially for those away from home
resolutions: Social events: movie nights, speed-friending, and coffee chats
